backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a product catalog with luxury, vintage, and dupe categories, providing functions to add products and query them by name, category, or retrieve all products.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of 'using Caffeine.ai' with 'by Nav' in the Footer component, linking to test ID REQ-48.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, hooks, and configuration for a luxury fashion e-commerce site with gold/black theming.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a luxury color palette and design tokens for light and dark themes using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the LuxeLogic application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component orchestrating the page layout with loading screen, header, hero, multiple product showcases, section dividers, about section, and footer.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component featuring brand mission text, statistics grid, gold-bordered image, and fade-in scroll animation with error handling.
frontend/src/components/CollectionsShowc: Product showcase component filtering and displaying luxury and vintage products with featured imagery, loading skeletons, error handling, and fade-in animations.
Refined alternatives section component filtering and displaying dupe category products with softer gold styling, featured imagery grid, and fade-in scroll effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with fade-in animation displaying LuxeLogic branding, navigation links (Collections, Refined Alternatives, About), and copyright information with three-column grid layout.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header component with LuxeLogic logo and navigation menu featuring animated underline hover effects for Collections, Refined Alternatives, and About links.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with animated gold light streaks, background image with gradient overlay, and centered heading "Curated Luxury. Timeless Power." with call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay displaying animated "LL" monogram that fades out when loading completes.
frontend/src/components/MenswearShowcase: Menswear showcase section with asymmetric grid layout displaying product images in various sizes, featuring "Timeless Elegance" heading and descriptive text about luxury menswear collection.
frontend/src/components/SectionDivider.t: Decorative section divider component with background image, gold borders, and optional centered text overlay for visual separation between page sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFadeInOnScroll.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to trigger fade-in animations when elements scroll into viewport with configurable threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hook that fetches all products from the backend actor, enabled only when actor is available and not fetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining a luxury dark theme with deep matte black (#0B0B0B) and metallic gold (#C6A75E) color palette, custom utility classes for gold glows, shadows, gradients, and animations, plus Tailwind directives and Google Fonts imports for Playfair Display and Inter.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, luxury-themed shadows, custom spacing, Playfair Display and Inter font families, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state document describing LuxeLogic as a luxury fashion brand website with dark villainous aesthetic, curated collections including 'Refined Alternatives' dupes, and existing features for hero section, collections showcase, about section, and dark theme implementation.
